attributes.action: raise awareness about the cost of living crisis and break the stigma around it
attributes.additional_details: we want to break the stigma around this topic as this is a big issue for many people.
attributes.background: We want you to help raise awareness about the cost of living crisis by informing the public through putting up billboards in populated areas and putting up posters on buses, trains etc.

rejection.details: The Government us already running a campaign about support for the cost of living: https://helpforhouseholds.campaign.gov.uk/
